briefTitle: Phase III Study of MLN0002 (300 mg) in Treatment of Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: Phase III, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blinded, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety, and Pharmacokinetics of Intravenous MLN0002 (300 mg) Infusion in Induction and Maintenance Therapy in Japanese Subjects With Moderate or Severe Crohn's Disease
summary: This study is a phase 3, multicenter, randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study to examine the efficacy, safety, and pharmacokinetics of vedolizumab (MLN0002) in induction and maintenance therapy in Japanese participants with moderately or severely active Crohn's disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Induction Phase: Percentage of Participants With Crohn's Disease Activity Index (CDAI)-100 Response
